Using the voting system

An overly brief guide

To allow user to vote on a certain nodetype (or just a certain node) you have to do a couple of things. First make sure that the node's nodetype is listed in the "validTypes" field in [vote settings]. Next, you must make a form (or include in a previously existing form) the lines:

<INPUT TYPE="hidden" name="op" value="vote">

This will make sure that the [vote] opcode is executed on the form submission. Next you include the htmlcode reference to the [voteit] function. If you are using a metanode, you can use "voteit:NODE_ID" and the option buttons will vote on the target node.
